name: CBPeripheralManagerConnectionLatency
desc: Values representing the connection latency of the peripheral manager.

items.name: case low
items.desc: A latency setting indicating that prioritizes rapid communication over battery life.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: A latency setting that balances communication frequency and battery life.

items.name: case high
items.desc: A latency setting that prioritizes extending battery life over rapid communication.
